ca.uqac.lif.ecp.atomic

Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.graphs.LabelledGraph<T>
      • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.CayleyGraph<AtomicEvent,U>
        • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.atomic.AtomicCayleyGraph<java.lang.String>
          • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.atomic.Automaton

  • public class Automaton
extends AtomicCayleyGraph<java.lang.String>
    Implementation of a deterministic finite-state automaton. For the sake of this project, the FSA is simply viewed as a special case of Cayley graph whose labelling is irrelevant.
    Author:
    Sylvain

        Takes a transition from a given state
        Parameters:
        current_vertex - The current state
        event - The event
        Returns:
        The edge representing the transition to take

      • makeTotal

        public void makeTotal()
        Modifies the transition function of the automaton by adding a sink state and putting an "else" transition from every state to this sink. This has for effect that the transition function becomes total.

      • replaceElse

        public void replaceElse()
        On each state, replaces any "else" transition by concrete transitions for all labels except those already present on outgoing transitions.
